Articles.Content:
Hi all!

I got the game yesterday and with the help of some tutorials went into orbit around Kerbin after a few tries, and today I managed my first Mun landing and safe return! Incredibly enough on my first try with that craft. I uploaded a small folder with snapshots from the trip: My first Munlanding (oddly enough Bob doesn\'t seem to be terribly excited to be on the Mun)

the next challenge I\'ve set for myself is to design my own Mun rocket. So far I got one into orbit around the Mun, with a little more fuel I should be able to land and make it back to Kerbin, so that\'s also progressing well.

And eventually I guess I\'ll look into the mods. *waves*

Welcome to the forums! We\'re glad to have you here. When you do start to delve into the mods, I suggest that you look at Silisko Edition, NovaPunch, and the C7 flight pack. They\'re pretty good, and they\'ll set you off. There is a bit of a learning curve on the C7 pack though.

Seems you\'re off to a great start!

Welcome to the KSP Forums, enjoy your stay!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
Impressive work for a beginner - and I agree with Cepheus - mods can make the game even better!
